resources.string:
Use the navigation bar to navigate. 
 
 Server Songs contains some preloaded songs. 
 
 Your Spotify Playlist contains songs loaded from your recent Spotify playlist history. 
 
 Settings allows you to change the lyric language. 
 
 The default is the language of the original song, unless otherwise chosen. 
 
 Use the Search Icon on the toolbar to search all Spotify songs. 
 
 Note that when selecting non-English songs, lyric generation may take a couple of minutes. This will only happen the first time a given song is selected.
Which language would you like song lyrics to be displayed in (in addition to original language)?
Generating emojis/translations...\n(this may take a few minutes)
